title: Financial Balance Sheet RAG System
description: Hybrid agentic RAG for balance-sheet Q&A using LangChain, HuggingFace, ChromaDB, Supabase (private server). Text-to-SQL for tabular reasoning, multi-hop retrieval; MLOps with Docker, CI/CD, MLflow; eval via RAGAS/Prometheus.

title: Resident Segmentation & Responsible AI (Hennepin County)
description: ML-driven resident segmentation with automated ETL and Power BI reporting to enhance digital accessibility. Built a Responsible AI evaluation framework (fairness metrics, human-in-loop review, bias mitigation).

title: Real Estate ML Pipelines (MarketMaker CRE)
description: Async scraping → ETL (dbt) → ML (XGBoost/RF) with SHAP/LIME for valuation & segmentation. Containerized FastAPI microservices, Azure SQL/Mongo integrations.

title: Selected Academic Projects
description: Stock Market ML (Python), Sports Analytics (R), Manufacturing Cost Optimizer (LP), OCR + NLP (EasyOCR + spaCy) for document parsing with ETL middleware.

title: Interactive PAC-MAN using MobileNet
description: Gesture-controlled PAC-MAN using MobileNet for real-time gameplay.

title: GeoAI for Environmental Analysis
description: Geospatial AI with spatial statistics to analyze and predict environmental changes.

title: Health Informatics: Diabetes & SDOH
description: Analyzed diabetes prevalence against ADI/SVI neighborhood indices using spatial visualization.

title: Business Optimization via Social Data
description: NLP + RL + Bayesian optimization for virality detection, ad optimization, and trend forecasting.
